metadata.mapbox:title: Place labels visibility
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows and hides place label layers.

metadata.mapbox:title: Road labels visibility
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows and hides all road label, including road shields.

metadata.mapbox:title: POI labels visibility
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows or hides all POIs icons and text.

metadata.mapbox:title: Transit labels visibility
metadata.mapbox:description: Shows or hides all transit icons and text.

metadata.mapbox:title: Light
metadata.mapbox:description: Switch between 4 time-of-day states: dusk, dawn, noon and night.

metadata.mapbox:title: Font
metadata.mapbox:description: Defines font family for the style from predefined options.
